appDesc.message: Vertaal wat u leest en wat u schrijft met de DeepL Translator, 's werelds beste AI-vertaler.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

context_menus_translate_section.description: The right click context menu action to trigger an inline translation

default_popup_button_done.description: Button to close the default popup of the extension (settings)

error_message_generic_error.message: Uw tekst kon niet worden vertaald. Probeer het later opnieuw.
error_message_generic_error.description: Genric error to tell the user that there is a technical problem

error_message_technical_issue.message: Uw tekst kon niet worden vertaald vanwege een bekend technisch probleem. Wij doen ons best om dit probleem zo snel mogelijk te verhelpen.

error_message_too_many_requests.message: Uw tekst kon niet worden vertaald. Het lijkt erop dat uw netwerk te veel oproepen naar onze servers verstuurt.
error_message_too_many_requests.description: Info for free users that too many requests are triggered

extension_settings_keyboard_shortcut_per.description: This text will be displayed in the settings screen of the browser (we can only set the label here).

full_page_translation_error_exceeds_char.message: De pagina kan niet worden vertaald omdat deze de tekenlimiet overschrijdt.
full_page_translation_error_exceeds_char.description: If a single element of the website has more than 5,500 characters, we can't translate it. And in that case there is nothing the user can do.

full_page_translation_error_service_not_.message: Het vertalen van hele pagina's is momenteel helaas niet mogelijk. Wij doen ons best om dit probleem zo snel mogelijk te verhelpen.

full_page_translation_info_google_transl.message: Het lijkt erop dat u ook Google Translate gebruikt. Schakel Google Translate uit om ervoor te zorgen dat de DeepL Translator-extensie naar behoren kan functioneren.

full_page_translation_no_translate_lang_.message: Zoals gewenst zal er niet worden vertaald vanuit deze taal:

full_page_translation_no_translate_websi.message: Zoals gewenst zal er geen vertaling worden gemaakt van:

full_page_translation_no_website_data.message: De websitegegevens konden niet worden opgehaald. Laad de pagina indien mogelijk opnieuw.

full_page_translation_settings_done_butt.description: Done button for the settings page

full_page_translation_settings_subheader.description:
Translate pages sub-header label

The screenshot is outdated, "pages" should be in lowercase

inline_translation_settings_headline.description: Headline for settings section of the inline translation

inline_translation_settings_target_langu.message: Klik met de rechtermuisknop om te vertalen naar het
inline_translation_settings_target_langu.description: Label for selecting the target language for inline translation. Most often this is the user's native language.

inline_translation_show_more.description: Text for a link that opens deepl in a new tab where the selected text is prefilled

input_translation_button_translate.description: Button in the settings screen of the input translation to trigger a translation

input_translation_option_choose_language.description: If the user selects this option, each click on the button opens a selection to choose the target language

input_translation_option_default_transla.description: If the user selects this option, each button click immediately triggers a translation into the selected target languages

input_translation_settings_headline.description: Headline for settings section of the translation of user input

input_translation_settings_target_langua.message: Vertaal wat ik schrijf naar het
input_translation_settings_target_langua.description: Label for selecting the target language for input translation.

input_translation_tooltip_settings.description: Tooltip to inform the user the button click open the settings for the input translation

input_translation_tooltip_translate.description: Tooltip to inform the user the button click will trigger a translation of the written text

input_translation_tooltip_translate_to_u.description: Tooltip to inform the user that he/she must select a target language

layout_header_label_language_switch.description: Label for the "Translate to" inline select to translate popup.

login_link_label.description: Login to DeepL Pro link label

login_link_try_pro_label.description:
Link to try DeepL Pro for free

The link to "Try DeepL Pro Free" leads to : https://www.deepl.com/pro

menu_login_label.description:
Log in to DeepL Pro Link label

Please check the Jira ticket for more context on this key: https://jira.deepl.dev/browse/TNL-711

menu_trial_label.description: Menu Try DeepL Pro for free label

notification_keyboard_shortcut_hint.message: Stel uw eigen sneltoets voor het vertalen van tekst in via de $settings$.
notification_keyboard_shortcut_hint.description: A notification which will be displayed for 4 seconds. It contains a link to the browser settings to set shortcut for extensions.

settings_set_shortcuts_headline.description: The headline for the shortcut setting

settings_set_shortcuts_link.description: A message which contains a link to the browser settings to set shortcut for extensions.

supported_languages_undefined.description: The user has not yet selected a target language.

switch_component_off.description: The OFF state for the switch ui element

switch_component_on.description: The ON state for the switch ui element
